item.description:
I read an article that was saying Massachusetts residents are getting "snow fatigue." Frankly I don't know what that means, but if you feel like that, get out and get some sun with us on Saturday at Great Brook!! The fresh air, sun and exercise will do you good - and sadly, one day all this snow will melt so get out and enjoy it!

Open to all abilities, we break up into groups based on experience/fitness. Bring a picnic lunch if you like, there is no food service at Great Brook, just cookies and cocoa.

Be INSIDE the barn by the big door and READY TO SKI by 10:00 AM. Great Brook rents all kinds of gear rental fee $13, trail passes are $12, and it is CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY.

Please correspond with each other if you need a ride.

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Great Brook Saturday
